You can try adding `<has_titlebar>false</has_titlebar>` to your plugin's config. See [this](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/src/07b9950fda25fbaf0a2a68f1173738a6827437d1/examples/config/plugin_params.config?at=test_example_configs&fileviewer=file-view-default) example. 

Note that all plugins also come with a context menu (right-click) which has a close option. You can disable it by overriding `Plugin::ShowContextMenu` on your plugin  as shown on [this](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/src/07b9950fda25fbaf0a2a68f1173738a6827437d1/examples/plugin/custom_context_menu/CustomContext.cc?at=test_example_configs&fileviewer=file-view-default) example.

Does that fit your needs?
